channel.title: RemakeScape - 2006 F2P remake
channel.description:
Hey, im developing a RuneScape 2006 remake, which will be F2P. I know theres alot to do, but i will not quit this.
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dhh3jb.png[/img][url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8IR2-sHAUcyyASranIdgNQ]http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8IR2-sHAUcyyASranIdgNQ[/url]
Base: Delta.
Progress (Credits to Vault):
[size=18pt]Last updates:[/size] [7/21/2012] *Fixed huge lag cycles when reaching 700+ bots [7/19/2012] *Completed Black Knights' Fortress Quest (Thanks to TiVo444 for quest journal) [7/19/2012] *Sheep Shearer Quest (Credits to TiVo444) [7/18/2012] *Re-written Firemaking (It missed some small things) [7/3/2012] *Hitpoints bug fixed (HP got set to max everytime you relogged)
[size=18pt]Combat:[/size] *PvP fully complete *PvN fully complete *Perfect max hit formulas *Perfect accuracy formula *Equipment requirements
[size=18pt]Magic:[/size] *Every modern combat spell *Can't mage through walls *Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working *Bones to bananas *Weakening spells *binding *Teleports *Alching *Superheat *Enchanting jewelry
[size=18pt]Ranged:[/size] *Bows/arrows *Crossbows (the regular one) *Can't shoot through walls *Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
[size=18pt]Prayer:[/size] *All bones bury-able *Every prayer working properly *Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[size=18pt]Mining:[/size] *Emptying and refilling rocks *All ores can be mined *Correct pickaxe finding and animations *Prospecting *Random chance of obtaining gems *Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
[size=18pt]Firemaking:[/size] *All logs light able *Adding and depleting of lightened logs *"Backward" firelighting *Ashes appear after logs burn out *Correct animations *Clipped
[size=18pt]Woodcutting:[/size] *Stumps and regrowing trees *Correct hatchet finding *Correct hatchet animations *All trees cut-able *Correct fell chance algorithms
[size=18pt]Crafting:[/size] *Cutting gems *Making amulets, necklaces, and rings *Stringing amulets *Tanning normal and hard leather *Crafting normal and hard leather.. *Spinning wool *Making pottery
[size=18pt]Fishing:[/size] *All fish can be caught *Correct item requirements *Fishing spots located all around the world *Correct animations
[size=18pt]Cooking:[/size] *All fish can be cooked *All meats can be cooked *Grinding wheat into flour *Cakes *Pies *Pizza *Stew *Wine *Correct burning formula *Lumbridge cooking range bonus *Eating food (in pieces) *Correct animation and timing used
[size=18pt]Runecrafting:[/size] *All altars working *Correct multiple crafting *Talismans "Pull" to altars *Tiaras combining *Using tiaras
[size=18pt]Quests:[/size] *Cook's Assistant *Black Knights' Fortress *Witch's Potion *Doric's Quest *Sheep Shearer
[size=18pt]Tutorial Island:[/size] *Will not add for a while.
[size=18pt]Miscellaneous:[/size] *Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) *Complete clipping map (walls and tiles) - Supports clipping variation *Member items are named 'Members object', and can't be used *Music in all regions *Door system *Pickables (Onions, Potatoes, Cabbage and Wheat), fully respawning *Boat travelling (Karamja and Port Sarim) *Emotes in emote tab *Bank pin (Set, Change, Changing digits) *NPC Clipping(It already works, but not as i want it yet.) *Clipped following(It already works, but not as i want it yet.) *All Shops added *Hill giant dungeon using a Brass key
[size=18pt]Guilds:[/size] *Cooking Guild (Requires 32 cooking and a chef's hat)
[size=18pt]Random events:[/size] Genie Drunken dwarf Ent tree Explosive mining rocks Flying pickaxe heads Flying axe heads Whirlpool fishing Big fish stealing equipment Evil chicken Freaky Forester River troll Rock golem Shade Spirit tree Zombie More to come...
I will add more progress later.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/359xteo.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zgcfh3.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/3535f7b.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/nmbxva.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/b6r96s.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/206ixyu.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/284iz7.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ufaoh2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/f2phj5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/rk7upy.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/1zyj5w4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/xlz7gl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zfom83.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/14dople.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/zo20z.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jRja9.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/307vqtk.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/jpfm85.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/16jr6tf.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2wftlbd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/303b5fa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/9h2yxc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/24pihc0.jpg[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ir4xdz.jpg[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/1okvfq.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/34688ye.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/20fp7nm.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vlmqz4.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/d7ci9.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/9sa1zn.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/bgsaw3.png[/img]
Will add more pictures soon.
Comment please

item.title: RemakeScape - 2006 F2P remake
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:19, topic:438696”][quote author=Lin link=topic=541403.msg4027119#msg4027119 date=1340424074]
Not bad, but the thing about all RS remakes is they all focus on skills and quests, and only the big picture, not the things that make RuneScape good - the humor in the dialogue, the NPC interactions, eating too much cabbage, etc. I honestly don’t think this server will capture the feeling those give.
[/quote]

Honestly, nobody is going to whine about that eating too much cabbage part, and the npc dialogues weren’t all too funny.[/quote]That’s a matter of oppinion.

Read full topic

item.title: RemakeScape - 2006 F2P remake
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Lin:

Not bad, but the thing about all RS remakes is they all focus on skills and quests, and only the big picture, not the things that make RuneScape good - the humor in the dialogue, the NPC interactions, eating too much cabbage, etc. I honestly don’t think this server will capture the feeling those give.

Honestly, nobody is going to whine about that eating too much cabbage part, and the npc dialogues weren’t all too funny.

Read full topic
